data.text: My children, listen to what I am teaching you.
What I am teaching you is good,
When I was a young boy, loved by my mother,
my father told me, “Remember my words;
Obtain wisdom and understanding,
Do not turn away from wisdom,
The most important thing that you can do is to get wisdom.
If you consider being wise to be very valuable,
If you become wise, that will for you be like a beautiful wreath that is put {someone puts} on your head;
So now I say, “My son, heed what I say.
I am teaching you the way to live wisely;
If you live wisely,
Hold fast to the things I have taught you to do,
Do not do the things that wicked people do;
Stay away from those roads;
because evil people cannot sleep if they have not done some evil deed on that day.
What they eat and what they drink are things that they have obtained by acting wickedly and violently.”
The behavior of good/righteous people is like the light that begins to shine at dawn
But the behavior of wicked people is like deep/thick darkness.
My son, pay attention to what I am saying.
Keep them close to you;
because you will have [PRS] a good life and good health if you search for them and find them.
It is very important that you be careful about what you think,
Do not say anything that deceives others
Keep looking straight ahead toward the events that are before you,
Plan carefully where you will go and what you will do,
Do not leave the straight road by turning to the left or to the right.
